div.div: This search form uses an instant search feature. As you type, search results will appear automatically below the search field. When you've entered you desired search terms use tab to navigate through the available results and hit enter to open the selected page or document.

div.p: Attention Seniors: Another LOCAL scholarship is now available on the Guidance Office website! Kopp Family Foundation is offering 3 $250 scholarships to a CHS senior! ...
Each year KNUJ AM 860/97.3 FM presents the “SENIOR HONOR STUDENT” program contacting area high schools to interview the top male and female as Top Honor Seniors. This year...

img.alt: Elementary Message to Students: WE MISS YOU!

a.span: Elementary Message to Students: WE MISS YOU!

div.p: Central Elementary and Community Education staff members want students to know just how much they are missed.....Please click on the link below to watch a video made by...
Due to road construction, the Hamburg lunch pickup and book drive will be moved to the Hamburg Park for Monday, April 27th and Thursday April 30th.
Lunch pickup and book drive in Cologne and NYA will continue at the regular locations.

The Elementary Library has received many new and gently used books and we would like to give back to our students. Please stop by any of the lunch pick up locations on Monday, April 27th or Thursday, April 30th and help yourself to some free books! Reminder that the lunch pick up sites are in Hamburg, NYA and Cologne and run from 7:00-9:00 a.m.
CONGRATULATIONS to Central Middle School Principal Ron Erpenbach who has been named SW Minnesota Principal of the year!!
